{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:49.879
    | text      = Well, I can say that a big part of it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:52.040
    | text      = is the difficulties involved with COVID.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:56.199
    | text      = And then some personal life stuff kind of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:57.920
    | text      = disenchanted me a lot over a period of months.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:01.800
    | text      = And look, a lot of Seltzers are not very different.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:07.319
    | text      = Yeah, I think you could make it to a year and 500
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:13.319
    | text      = if you were on a Japanese game show where
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:15.240
    | text      = you had to live in a place where there's nothing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:17.319
    | text      = but Seltzers for a year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:18.319
    | text      = If someone brought me all of the Seltzers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:20.240
    | text      = and I was like, sip it, and they're like, oh, 50.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:22.079
    | text      = Who gives a shit?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:23.079
    | text      = Like, in those circumstances, I definitely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:26.480
    | text      = could have tried 50.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:27.360
    | text      = But after you try so many, it's like, I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:29.959
    | text      = This is fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:31.560
    | text      = It sucks, but it's not that bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:33.560
    | text      = It's not great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:34.959
    | text      = You really lose the enthusiasm to hunt
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:36.959
    | text      = down new Seltzers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:38.759
    | text      = And once you've already had everything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:40.519
    | text      = that's at every store within a couple miles of your house,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:44.480
    | text      = and you can't find anything else on Amazon,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:47.279
    | text      = it just becomes a real stu-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:49.519
    | text      = I mean, it was a stupid idea from the beginning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:51.199
    | text      = No, but I mean, you know, all of our ideas
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:53.600
    | text      = are somewhat stupid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:55.040
    | text      = Yeah, and I'm glad I tried.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:57.879
    | text      = I learned a few things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:59.519
    | text      = One is the wide, wide world of these Seltzers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:02.560
    | text      = There's so many.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:03.720
    | text      = And the ones that are more tea-like are better, I think.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:06.120
    | text      = I enjoy them more.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:07.079
    | text      = They have more depth of flavor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:10.120
    | text      = And so, hooray.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:12.319
    | text      = And in honor of ending the Year of the Seltzer,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:16.040
    | text      = I'm ending it with my novelty beverage for today,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:18.360
    | text      = which is a listener, Amani, sent some Sunwink
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:22.680
    | text      = Sparkle Herbal Tonics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:25.240
    | text      = And I've tried the one that is, I believe, turmeric-related.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:30.319
    | text      = And that one was all right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:31.439
    | text      = It's got a little spice to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:32.199
    | text      = Is it turmeric or turmeric?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:33.759
    | text      = I think it's pronounced turmeric,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:35.120
    | text      = but there is an R in there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:36.199
    | text      = That infuriates me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:37.279
    | text      = Yeah, it might be a silent R.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:38.360
    | text      = We can continue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:39.439
    | text      = So this is Sunwink Lemon Rose Uplift.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:43.079
    | text      = I feel like now is a good time for some uplifting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:45.560
    | text      = No, Lemon Rose, taking a sip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:47.920
    | text      = I noticed you playing around with that bottle
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:49.920
    | text      = before the show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:50.600
    | text      = And normally, you have a bit of an energy drink going on there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:54.720
    | text      = And how did you do?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:56.120
    | text      = It was really good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:56.959
    | text      = It was really good?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:57.600
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:57.920
    | text      = Nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:58.439
    | text      = Yeah, that's very tea-like.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:00.399
    | text      = It's reminiscent of those ones that had flour.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:04.839
    | text      = Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:06.439
    | text      = I mean, I guess rose is the flour.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:07.959
    | text      = Well, that would make sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:09.079
    | text      = Yeah, good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:09.600
    | text      = Those were real good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:10.480
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:11.240
    | text      = So thank you, Imani.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:12.360
    | text      = And thank you, everybody who has enjoyed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:15.000
    | text      = the year of the seltzer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:16.519
    | text      = I don't know if I'm going to do a year of anything else
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:18.720
    | text      = ever again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:19.279
    | text      = I doubt it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:20.759
    | text      = I learned a valuable lesson.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:22.519
    | text      = There's definitely that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:23.639
    | text      = It's humiliating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:24.720
    | text      = Think of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:25.279
    | text      = You got to round 350 seltzers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:27.079
    | text      = If you had set your goal for 300 seltzers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:30.079
    | text      = you wouldn't have made 350.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:31.279
    | text      = 500 was such an attractive number, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:33.159
    | text      = It's a nice round number.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.639
    | text      = Yeah, I mean, look, I achieved something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:36.639
    | text      = Indeed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:37.159
    | text      = Maybe?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:38.279
    | text      = Probably.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:39.679
    | text      = Let the viewer decide.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.919
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:42.759
    | text      = Anyway, Jordan, today, April 16th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.200
    | text      = Indeed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:46.279
    | text      = Ides of March.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:49.600
    | text      = I'm still writing June on my checks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:51.799
    | text      = So here we go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:52.440
    | text      = We're going to start off with Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:54.000
    | text      = talking about some headlines.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:55.960
    | text      = And then getting into something that is very bad news for us,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:59.879
    | text      = as you know, we are the chat guys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:02.039
    | text      = Now, they denied all of this in mainline publications
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.639
    | text      = until a few years ago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:05.720
    | text      = And now they run the same headline every week.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:08.279
    | text      = For the first time, animal human clones have been made.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:15.080
    | text      = That's always, it's in the test tube, it's embryonic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.200
    | text      = And that's just a condition, condition, condition,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:20.679
    | text      = condition.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:22.600
    | text      = The CIA was quoted in the Washington Post back in 1999
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:25.679
    | text      = that, oh, we're funding the body modification and tattoo
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:28.559
    | text      = and earring movement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.559
    | text      = Doesn't mean it's bad or good or anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:32.519
    | text      = All the things you said, all the things you said.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.440
    | text      = To get you ready for implantable chips.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.120
    | text      = I mean, this is all actually in different publications.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:39.919
    | text      = They admit all of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:41.039
    | text      = Yep, the CIA encouraged everyone to get earrings and tattoos.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.480
    | text      = It's really weird for the CIA to finally start admitting stuff
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.919
    | text      = and choose the stuff that I guess
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:49.399
    | text      = would take them down the most.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:51.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:51.519
    | text      = But, you know, what are you going to do?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:54.159
    | text      = Yeah, I don't know about this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.960
    | text      = Also, so the latest news in the animal human hybrid front
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:59.320
    | text      = is that there was an article published in the journal Cell,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:02.039
    | text      = where researchers injected human stem cells into monkey embryos,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.000
    | text      = which then they observed growing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.039
    | text      = Three of the embryos survived up to 19 days,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:10.639
    | text      = but they didn't create clones or anything like Alex is saying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.720
    | text      = This is a field of study, but it's not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:15.480
    | text      = what Alex is describing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.639
    | text      = And the scientific community is far
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:18.200
    | text      = from reaching a consensus on it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.759
    | text      = There are tons of debates that go on about the ethics
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.960
    | text      = or even the need for such research.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:23.600
    | text      = And you can find people who have informed opinions on both sides.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.840
    | text      = Alex is not one of them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:27.879
    | text      = Yeah, but, you know, once I saw that you could transfer
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:30.399
    | text      = the bioluminescence trait to another creature,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.320
    | text      = I was like, well, get rid of all other research.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:35.840
    | text      = Until I can glow in the dark, all science should stop.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.759
    | text      = Until everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:39.399
    | text      = Until everything can glow in the dark.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.480
    | text      = My buddy Dr. Gums used to get furious with me,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:44.480
    | text      = because I would constantly demand
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.919
    | text      = for him to explain to me why we can't photosynthesize.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.559
    | text      = Like, why can't we get a human that has photosynthesis?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.399
    | text      = I would like to know that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.799
    | text      = I feel like we should.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:55.799
    | text      = I really think he had a compelling, full answer,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:58.679
    | text      = and I was too high to remember what it was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.200
    | text      = Well, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:01.240
    | text      = I don't remember.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:02.440
    | text      = Considering you've heard it many times, too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.399
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.159
    | text      = So this story, you know, the whole thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:07.480
    | text      = about the human-animal hybrids and stuff,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.639
    | text      = this is something that people like to take as an example
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:11.960
    | text      = of actually, Alex, he's right all along, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.440
    | text      = But the important thing to remember is that his version
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.799
    | text      = of this research, it doesn't match what actually exists.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:22.159
    | text      = The stories that he tells are different than reality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:25.080
    | text      = Just remember, we were talking about fish-human hybrids
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.799
    | text      = in tanks with sad human eyes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:29.759
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.320
    | text      = That's the kind of stuff that Alex talks about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.440
    | text      = And he claims that he's seen them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.600
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:35.360
    | text      = He's pinned to the tanks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.559
    | text      = We're not talking about injecting embryos.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.559
    | text      = We're talking about full-grown fish men wandering
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:42.279
    | text      = around our seas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:43.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.279
    | text      = It's very attractive for people to take headlines and then
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:48.919
    | text      = sort of out-of-context snippets of things Alex said,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:51.279
    | text      = and he's like, yeah, he's been right all along.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.399
    | text      = Showed you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.159
    | text      = It's not really accurate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.759
    | text      = It's a fun game, though, and I applaud people for playing it.
